fulltext:
Ly Phuc Man, Binh Thuan Ward, District 7, HCMC 
LE THI NGOC OANH 
ABOUT ME 
Careful, Hard – working, High sense of responsibility, Be honest 
CAREER 
OBJECTIVE 
1 - 3 YEARS 
✓ Self – developed, gain experiences and develop abilities in areas related to Accounting 
✓ Ensure work activities go smoothly so as to contribute to the efficiency of the company 
3 - 5 YEARS 
✓ Reach the supervisory position 
EXPERIENCE 
SENIOR ACCOUNTING ASSISTANT, LOTTE E-COMMERCE VIETNAM CO., LTD 
Apr 2017– Present 
✓ Receive and check payment request related departments (cash, local, overseas payment) 
✓ Follow up all bank account balances 
✓ Record all transactions related to cash on hand, expenses into accounting software 
✓ Accrue all expenses, check allocated expenses & depreciation expenses monthly 
✓ Prepare tax reports as VAT, PIT, withholding tax 
✓ Prepare daily reports on cash on hand to submit to CA, CFO 
✓ Check monthly payroll for 150+ employees 
✓ Breakdown detail balance of accounts in Balance Sheet 
✓ Organize and store paperwork and documents 
✓ Work with the auditor, tax officer, banks 
✓ Other duties required by CA, CFO and support co-workers 
✓ Support CA in closing time, and review all expense 
Key Learnt Points: Problem - solving, Work under pressure, Communication, Detail-
Oriented, Teamwork and Independently work, High sense of Responsibility 
SENIOR ACCOUNTING ASSISTANT, CIRCLE K VIET NAM 
Jun 2015 – Mar 2017 
✓ Receiving and checking payment request related department 
✓ Prepare petty cash monthly payment (Receipt, Payment voucher) and bank application transfer 
✓ Record all transactions into accounting software 
✓ Prepare daily cash report, monthly VAT report, cash advance report on 10th, 20th & the day 
end of month 
✓ Breakdown detail list in balance sheet (advance account, payable account) 
✓ Prepare monthly management reports (Profit & Loss, Distribution Center report) and ad - 
hoc reports are assigned based on management requirement 
✓ Collecting, reconciling and analyzing expenses and incomes 
✓ Arranging & filling accounting documents monthly 
Key Learnt Points: Analytical thinking, Cost management, Problem - solving, Team work, 
Work under pressure, Communication 
ACCOUNTING ASSISTANT, NGUYEN LONG MERCHANDISE SERVICE CO., 
LTD May 2016 – Mar 2017 
✓ Receiving and checking documents for payment (cash, local and overseas payment) 
✓ Record all transactions into accounting software 
✓ Issue sales invoices and check purchase invoices 
✓ Do monthly bookkeeping (Trial Balance, Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss) 
✓ Prepare quarterly loan report & supporting documents 
✓ Be responsible for quarterly tax reports 
✓ Another work if has required 
Key Learnt Points: Analytical thinking, Work under pressure, Careful, Problem – solving, Detail 
- oriented 
ACCOUNTING ASSISTANT, LONG HOANG GIA SEED CO., 
LTD Jan 2015 – May 2015 
✓ Manage cash on hand, inventory, receivable account 
✓ Checking cash, inventory monthly & reconciliation with accounting records 
✓ Record related transactions into accounting software 
✓ Make insurance and customs procedures 
✓ Deal with unexpected problems and issues 
Key Learnt Points: Careful, Communication, Sense of Responsibility 
EDUCATION 
2010 – 2014: THE UNIVERSITY OF ECONOMICS HO CHI MINH CITY 
✓ Major in Accounting 
✓ GPA: 7.57/10 
SKILLS AND 
ABILITIES 
COMPUTER 
✓ Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook) 
✓ Good at using accounting software: SAP, MISA 
LANGUAGE 
✓ Vietnamese: Native 
✓ English: Intermediate (TOEIC 650) 
WORKING SKILLS 
✓ Good at both team working and independent working 
✓ Ability to work under pressure 
✓ High adaptability 
✓ Willing to learn with positive attitude & attention to detail in work 
REFERENCES 
✓ MR. TRAN ANH VU 
Finance Manager – Circle K Viet Nam 
Cellphone: 0938 513 181 
✓ MS. NGUYEN XUAN THOAI 
Chief Accountant – Lotte E-Commerce Vietnam Co., 
Ltd Cellphone: 0386 788 880
